overview: John Figg has a great career and a gorgeous fianc√©e. When he inherits a nice house in a quiet neighborhood, he finally starts to feel like his life is coming together. Trouble arises, however, when John's house is burglarized, and the thieves steal one of his most prized possessions.
tagline: When you don't know who to trust, sleep with both eyes open.
title: The Insomniac
